mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_organization (name,trade_code_id,user_count,description,address,telephone,logo,site,status,expire_time,create_time,modify_time) VALUES (#{name},#{tradeCodeId},#{userCount},#{description},#{address},#{telephone},#{logo},#{site},#{status},
date_add(now(), interval 30 day),
#{expireTime,typeHandler=com.ace.erp.handler.mybatis.StringISODateTimeTypeHandler},
now(),
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ace.erp.handler.mybatis.StringISODateTimeTypeHandler},
now()
#{modifyTime,typeHandler=com.ace.erp.handler.mybatis.StringISODateTimeTypeHandler}
)
mapper.select: SELECT so.id as organ_id,so.name,so.trade_code_id,so.user_count, so.logo,so.site,so.description,so.address,so.status as organ_status, so.create_time as organ_create_time, so.expire_time,so.modify_time as organ_modify_time, so.telephone, su.id,su.username, su.password, su.email,su.mobile_phone_number, su.salt,su.status as user_status, su.deleted, su.admin,su.create_time, su.modify_time FROM sys_organization as so LEFT JOIN sys_user_organization AS suo ON so.id = suo.organization_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON suo.user_id = su.id WHERE so.id = #{id}
